mapper.insert: insert into stock_fina_sta (code, report_name, total_revenue, total_revenue_inc, ded_non_net_profit, ded_non_net_profit_inc, gross_selling_rate, gross_selling_rate_inc, asset_liab_ratio, asset_liab_ratio_inc, basic_eps, basic_eps_inc, `date`) values (#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalRevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalRevenueInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dedNonNetProfit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dedNonNetProfitInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grossSellingRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grossSellingRateInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetLiabRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{assetLiabRatioInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{basicEps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{basicEpsInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{date,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update stock_fina_sta set total_revenue = #{totalRevenue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, total_revenue_inc = #{totalRevenueInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ded_non_net_profit = #{dedNonNetProfit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ded_non_net_profit_inc = #{dedNonNetProfitInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gross_selling_rate = #{grossSellingRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gross_selling_rate_inc = #{grossSellingRateInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_liab_ratio = #{assetLiabRatio,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, asset_liab_ratio_inc = #{assetLiabRatioInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, basic_eps = #{basicEps,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, basic_eps_inc = #{basicEpsInc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `date` = #{date,jdbcType=INTEGER} where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and report_name = #{reportName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select code, report_name, total_revenue, total_revenue_inc, ded_non_net_profit, ded_non_net_profit_inc, gross_selling_rate, gross_selling_rate_inc, asset_liab_ratio, asset_liab_ratio_inc, basic_eps, basic_eps_inc, `date` from stock_fina_sta

select code, report_name, total_revenue, total_revenue_inc, ded_non_net_profit, ded_non_net_profit_inc, gross_selling_rate, gross_selling_rate_inc, asset_liab_ratio, asset_liab_ratio_inc, basic_eps, basic_eps_inc, `date` from stock_fina_sta where code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by date desc
mapper.insert:
insert into stock_fina_sta (code, report_name, total_revenue, total_revenue_inc, ded_non_net_profit, ded_non_net_profit_inc, gross_selling_rate, gross_selling_rate_inc, asset_liab_ratio, asset_liab_ratio_inc, basic_eps, basic_eps_inc, `date`) values
